fields.name: ArtCollab Beta Testing
fields.description: Launch an initiative to conduct beta testing for ArtCollab, a collaborative digital art platform, inviting artists to participate and provide feedback on usability, features, and overall experience. The initiative aims to refine the platform before its official launch.

fields.name: ArtCollab Community Spotlight
fields.description: Launch an initiative to showcase the artworks created by the ArtCollab community, highlighting talented artists and their contributions to the platform. The initiative aims to foster a sense of community and appreciation among users.

fields.title: Community Art Collaboration Challenge
fields.description: Launch a challenge for the CloudCanvas community to collaborate on creating a large-scale artwork. Participants will contribute their unique artistic styles to a shared canvas, resulting in a collective masterpiece.
fields.short_description: Collaborative challenge for community artwork creation.

fields.title: Artist Showcase Challenge
fields.description: Launch a challenge for CloudCanvas artists to showcase their individual artworks and portfolios. Participants will have the opportunity to gain exposure and connect with potential collaborators and clients.
fields.short_description: Challenge for artists to showcase their portfolios.

fields.title: CloudCanvas Art Competition
fields.description: A competition for digital artists to showcase their best works created using CloudCanvas.

fields.title: CloudCanvas: Integrate AI-Assisted Art Generation
fields.description: Implement AI-assisted art generation features in CloudCanvas to help artists overcome creative blocks and explore new artistic styles.

fields.title: CloudCanvas: Layer Blending Issue
fields.description: Users report inconsistent behavior when blending layers with certain brush types, leading to unexpected visual artifacts in the final artwork.
